name: flauntingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows or makes obvious something you are proud of in order to get admiration: He was flauntingly waving his gold credit card around, buying drinks for everyone. The posters were flauntingly plastered over every spare piece of wall.
More examplesFewer examplesShe flauntingly and provocatively tossed her long, shiny hair from side to side.His image as a tough loner of a cowboy is a flauntingly masculine one.I've never really seen myself as flauntingly feminine.
